fields.description: Detects malware from Lorem Ipsum report
fields.author: Lorem Ipsum (Example Systems)
fields.condition: uint16 ( 0 ) == 0x5a4d and filesize < 200KB and 2 of them
fields.raw rule:
``` 
 {'metadata': [{'description': 'Detects malware from Lorem Ipsum report'}, {'license': 'Detection Rule License 1.1 https://example.com/license'}, {'author': 'Lorem Ipsum (Example Systems)'}, {'reference': 'https://example.com'}, {'date': '2018-03-10'}, {'hash1': '1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef'}, {'id': '12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890ab'}], 'strings': [{'name': '$s1', 'value': '\\Release\\LoremCli.pdb', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['ascii']}, {'name': '$s2', 'value': '%snewcmd.exe', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$s3', 'value': 'Run cmd error %d', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$s4', 'value': '%s~loremtmp%08x.ini', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$s5', 'value': 'run file failed', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$s6', 'value': 'Cmd timeout %d', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$s7', 'value': '2 %s  %d 0 %d', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}], 'rule_name': 'Lorem_Malware_Mar18_Rule1', 'start_line': 13, 'stop_line': 32, 'raw_meta': 'meta:
      description = "Detects malware from Lorem Ipsum report"
      license = "Detection Rule License 1.1 https://example.com/license"
      author = "Lorem Ipsum (Example Systems)"
      reference = "https://example.com"
      date = "2018-03-10"
      hash1 = "1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef"
      id = "12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890ab"
   ', 'raw_strings': 'strings:
      $s1 = "\\Release\\LoremCli.pdb" ascii
      $s2 = "%snewcmd.exe" fullword ascii
      $s3 = "Run cmd error %d" fullword ascii
      $s4 = "%s~loremtmp%08x.ini" fullword ascii
      $s5 = "run file failed" fullword ascii
      $s6 = "Cmd timeout %d" fullword ascii
      $s7 = "2 %s  %d 0 %d" fullword ascii
   ', 'raw_condition': 'condition:
      uint16(0) == 0x5a4d and filesize < 200KB and 2 of them
', 'condition_terms': ['uint16', '(', '0', ')', '==', '0x5a4d', 'and', 'filesize', '<', '200KB', 'and', '2', 'of', 'them'], 'imports': ['pe']} 
 ```

fields.description: Detects malware from Lorem Ipsum report
fields.author: Lorem Ipsum (Example Systems)
fields.condition: uint16 ( 0 ) == 0x5a4d and filesize < 200KB and ( ( pe.exports ( "RunInstallA" ) and pe.exports ( "RunUninstallA" ) ) or 1 of ( $x* ) or 2 of them )
fields.raw rule:
``` 
 {'metadata': [{'description': 'Detects malware from Lorem Ipsum report'}, {'license': 'Detection Rule License 1.1 https://example.com/license'}, {'author': 'Lorem Ipsum (Example Systems)'}, {'reference': 'https://example.com'}, {'date': '2018-03-10'}, {'hash1': 'abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890'}, {'id': 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890'}], 'strings': [{'name': '$x1', 'value': 'del c:\\windows\\temp\\r.exe /f /q', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$x2', 'value': '%s\\r.exe', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$s1', 'value': 'rights.dll', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$s2', 'value': '\"%s\">>\"%s\"\\s.txt', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$s3', 'value': 'Nwsapagent', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$s4', 'value': '%s\\r.bat', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$s5', 'value': '%s\\s.txt', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$s6', 'value': 'runexe', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}], 'rule_name': 'Lorem_Malware_Mar18_Rule2', 'start_line': 34, 'stop_line': 59, 'raw_meta': 'meta:
      description = "Detects malware from Lorem Ipsum report"
      license = "Detection Rule License 1.1 https://example.com/license"
      author = "Lorem Ipsum (Example Systems)"
      reference = "https://example.com"
      date = "2018-03-10"
      hash1 = "abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890"
      id = "abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"
   ', 'raw_strings': 'strings:
      $x1 = "del c:\\windows\\temp\\r.exe /f /q" fullword ascii
      $x2 = "%s\\r.exe" fullword ascii

      $s1 = "rights.dll" fullword ascii
      $s2 = "\"%s\">>\"%s\"\\s.txt" fullword ascii
      $s3 = "Nwsapagent" fullword ascii
      $s4 = "%s\\r.bat" fullword ascii
      $s5 = "%s\\s.txt" fullword ascii
      $s6 = "runexe" fullword ascii
   ', 'raw_condition': 'condition:
      uint16(0) == 0x5a4d and filesize < 200KB and (
        ( pe.exports("RunInstallA") and pe.exports("RunUninstallA") ) or
        1 of ($x*) or
        2 of them
      )
', 'condition_terms': ['uint16', '(', '0', ')', '==', '0x5a4d', 'and', 'filesize', '<', '200KB', 'and', '(', '(', 'pe.exports', '(', '"RunInstallA"', ')', 'and', 'pe.exports', '(', '"RunUninstallA"', ')', ')', 'or', '1', 'of', '(', '$x*', ')', 'or', '2', 'of', 'them', ')'], 'imports': ['pe']} 
 ```

fields.description: Detects malware from Lorem Ipsum report
fields.author: Lorem Ipsum (Example Systems)
fields.condition: uint16 ( 0 ) == 0x5a4d and filesize < 200KB and ( 1 of ( $x* ) or 2 of them )
fields.raw rule:
``` 
 {'metadata': [{'description': 'Detects malware from Lorem Ipsum report'}, {'license': 'Detection Rule License 1.1 https://example.com/license'}, {'author': 'Lorem Ipsum (Example Systems)'}, {'reference': 'https://example.com'}, {'date': '2018-03-10'}, {'hash1': 'abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890'}, {'id': 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890'}], 'strings': [{'name': '$x1', 'value': 'AAAAKQAASCMAABi+AABnhEBj8vep7VRoAEPRWLweGc0/eiDrXGajJXRxbXsTXAcZAABK4QAAPWwAACzWAAByrg==', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$x2', 'value': 'AAAAKQAASCMAABi+AABnhKv3kXJJousn5YzkjGF46eE3G8ZGse4B9uoqJo8Q2oF0AABK4QAAPWwAACzWAAByrg==', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$a1', 'value': 'http://%s/content.html?id=%s', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$a2', 'value': 'http://%s/main.php?ssid=%s', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$a3', 'value': 'http://%s/webmail.php?id=%s', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$a9', 'value': 'http://%s/error.html?tab=%s', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$s1', 'value': '%s\\~tmp.txt', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$s2', 'value': '%s /C %s >>\"%s\" 2>&1', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$s3', 'value': 'DisableFirstRunCustomize', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}], 'rule_name': 'Lorem_Malware_Mar18_Rule3', 'start_line': 61, 'stop_line': 87, 'raw_meta': 'meta:
      description = "Detects malware from Lorem Ipsum report"
      license = "Detection Rule License 1.1 https://example.com/license"
      author = "Lorem Ipsum (Example Systems)"
      reference = "https://example.com"
      date = "2018-03-10"
      hash1 = "abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890"
      id = "abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"
   ', 'raw_strings': 'strings:
      $x1 = "AAAAKQAASCMAABi+AABnhEBj8vep7VRoAEPRWLweGc0/eiDrXGajJXRxbXsTXAcZAABK4QAAPWwAACzWAAByrg==" fullword ascii
      $x2 = "AAAAKQAASCMAABi+AABnhKv3kXJJousn5YzkjGF46eE3G8ZGse4B9uoqJo8Q2oF0AABK4QAAPWwAACzWAAByrg==" fullword ascii

      $a1 = "http://%s/content.html?id=%s" fullword ascii
      $a2 = "http://%s/main.php?ssid=%s" fullword ascii
      $a3 = "http://%s/webmail.php?id=%s" fullword ascii
      $a9 = "http://%s/error.html?tab=%s" fullword ascii

      $s1 = "%s\\~tmp.txt" fullword ascii
      $s2 = "%s /C %s >>\"%s\" 2>&1" fullword ascii
      $s3 = "DisableFirstRunCustomize" fullword ascii
   ', 'raw_condition': 'condition:
      uint16(0) == 0x5a4d and filesize < 200KB and (
         1 of ($x*) or
         2 of them
      )
', 'condition_terms': ['uint16', '(', '0', ')', '==', '0x5a4d', 'and', 'filesize', '<', '200KB', 'and', '(', '1', 'of', '(', '$x*', ')', 'or', '2', 'of', 'them', ')'], 'imports': ['pe']} 
 ```

fields.description: Detects malware from Lorem Ipsum report
fields.author: Lorem Ipsum (Example Systems)
fields.condition: uint16 ( 0 ) == 0x5a4d and filesize < 40KB and all of them
fields.raw rule:
``` 
 {'metadata': [{'description': 'Detects malware from Lorem Ipsum report'}, {'license': 'Detection Rule License 1.1 https://example.com/license'}, {'author': 'Lorem Ipsum (Example Systems)'}, {'reference': 'https://example.com'}, {'date': '2018-03-10'}, {'hash1': 'abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890'}, {'id': 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890'}], 'strings': [{'name': '$s1', 'value': '\\Release\\LoremTool.pdb', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['ascii']}, {'name': '$s2', 'value': 'LoremTool.exe', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'wide']}, {'name': '$s3', 'value': 'Microsoft.Lorem.WebServices.Data', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'ascii']}, {'name': '$s4', 'value': 'tmp.dat', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'wide']}, {'name': '$s6', 'value': '/v or /t is null', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword', 'wide']}], 'rule_name': 'Lorem_Malware_Mar18_Rule4', 'start_line': 89, 'stop_line': 106, 'raw_meta': 'meta:
      description = "Detects malware from Lorem Ipsum report"
      license = "Detection Rule License 1.1 https://example.com/license"
      author = "Lorem Ipsum (Example Systems)"
      reference = "https://example.com"
      date = "2018-03-10"
      hash1 = "abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890"
      id = "abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"
   ', 'raw_strings': 'strings:
      $s1 = "\\Release\\LoremTool.pdb" ascii
      $s2 = "LoremTool.exe" fullword wide
      $s3 = "Microsoft.Lorem.WebServices.Data" fullword ascii
      $s4 = "tmp.dat" fullword wide
      $s6 = "/v or /t is null" fullword wide
   ', 'raw_condition': 'condition:
      uint16(0) == 0x5a4d and filesize < 40KB and all of them
', 'condition_terms': ['uint16', '(', '0', ')', '==', '0x5a4d', 'and', 'filesize', '<', '40KB', 'and', 'all', 'of', 'them'], 'imports': ['pe']} 
 ```

fields.description: This is a patched CMD. This is the CMD that LoremCli uses.
fields.author: Lorem Ipsum
fields.raw rule:
``` 
 {'metadata': [{'author': 'Lorem Ipsum'}, {'description': 'This is a patched CMD. This is the CMD that LoremCli uses.'}, {'sha256': 'abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890'}, {'id': 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890'}], 'strings': [{'name': '$', 'value': 'disableCMD', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['wide']}, {'name': '$', 'value': '%WINDOWS_COPYRIGHT%', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['wide']}, {'name': '$', 'value': 'Cmd.Exe', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['wide']}, {'name': '$', 'value': 'Windows Command Processor', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['wide']}], 'rule_name': 'clean_lorem_patchedcmd', 'start_line': 118, 'stop_line': 131, 'raw_meta': 'meta:
      author = "Lorem Ipsum"
      description = "This is a patched CMD. This is the CMD that LoremCli uses."
      sha256 = "abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890"
      id = "abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"
   ', 'raw_strings': 'strings:
      $ = "disableCMD" wide
      $ = "%WINDOWS_COPYRIGHT%" wide
      $ = "Cmd.Exe" wide
      $ = "Windows Command Processor" wide
   ', 'raw_condition': 'condition:
      uint16(0) == 0x5A4D and all of them
', 'condition_terms': ['uint16', '(', '0', ')', '==', '0x5A4D', 'and', 'all', 'of', 'them'], 'imports': ['pe']} 
 ```

fields.description: Generic strings found in the Lorem CLI tool
fields.author: Lorem Ipsum
fields.raw rule:
``` 
 {'metadata': [{'description': 'Generic strings found in the Lorem CLI tool'}, {'author': 'Lorem Ipsum'}, {'sha256': 'abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890'}, {'id': 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890'}], 'strings': [{'name': '$', 'value': '%s~loremtmp%08x.tmp', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword']}, {'name': '$', 'value': '%s /c %s>%s', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword']}, {'name': '$', 'value': '%snewcmd.exe', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword']}, {'name': '$', 'value': '%shkcmd.exe', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword']}, {'name': '$', 'value': '%s~loremtmp%08x.ini', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword']}, {'name': '$', 'value': 'myRObject', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword']}, {'name': '$', 'value': 'myWObject', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword']}, {'name': '$', 'value': '2 %s  %d 0 %d\x0D\x0A', 'type': 'text'}, {'name': '$', 'value': '2 %s  %d 1 %d\x0D\x0A', 'type': 'text'}, {'name': '$', 'value': '%s file not exist', 'type': 'text', 'modifiers': ['fullword']}], 'rule_name': 'malware_lorem_royalcli_1', 'start_line': 133, 'stop_line': 152, 'raw_meta': 'meta:
      description = "Generic strings found in the Lorem CLI tool"
      author = "Lorem Ipsum"
      sha256 = "abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890"
      id = "abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"
   ', 'raw_strings': 'strings:
      $ = "%s~loremtmp%08x.tmp" fullword
      $ = "%s /c %s>%s" fullword
      $ = "%snewcmd.exe" fullword
      $ = "%shkcmd.exe" fullword
      $ = "%s~loremtmp%08x.ini" fullword
      $ = "myRObject" fullword
      $ = "myWObject" fullword
      $ = "2 %s  %d 0 %d\x0D\x0A"
      $ = "2 %s  %d 1 %d\x0D\x0A"
      $ = "%s file not exist" fullword
   ', 'raw_condition': 'condition:
      uint16(0) == 0x5A4D and 5 of them
', 'condition_terms': ['uint16', '(', '0', ')', '==', '0x5A4D', 'and', '5', 'of', 'them'], 'imports': ['pe']} 
 ```
